name: merge
summary: Merge multiple OSM files into one
description:
The merge command combines multiple OSM files into a single file. It handles:

- Duplicate element detection and removal
- Consistent ID management
- Metadata preservation
- Large file handling with streaming

Useful for combining regional extracts or assembling data from multiple sources.
output:
OSM XML file containing all unique elements from input files.
Duplicate elements (same ID and type) are included only once.
